p: Anti-NA Abs are also produced in response to the administration of seasonal vaccines. Recently, Monto et al. showed that 37 and 6% of human recipients of TIV and LAIV, respectively, had Abs with NAI activity, whereas the values of HAI for these same groups were 77 and 21.2%, respectively. They also reported that after the 2007â€“2008 influenza season, NAI levels in subjects with confirmed infection rose to 41% for TIV, 63% for LAIV, and 76 % for unvaccinated subjects, whereas HAI levels were 18%, 77% and 97%, respectively ( 74).
